title: Spring
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In the book Spring, students learn about some of the animals, plants, activities, and types of weather associated with spring. The simple repetitive text, supportive pictures, and use of the high-frequency word the support beginning readers.
meta: ball, bikes, birds, bunny, flowers, rain, rainbow, spring
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Nouns : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word the
